Key Match Events: India won the match by four wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli looked close to tears as he was swamped by his teammates
Babar Azam praised Kohli for finishing the game and shifting the momentum
Rohit Sharma called it the best innings Kohli has played for India
Virat Kohli thanked the fans for their support
India's elated celebration after winning by four wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shaheen Shah Afridi bowled from the pavilion end
